input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is IBMTSMActor

The query mgmtclass command displays information about the management classes available in your active policy set.
Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <operation-name>query-management-class</operation-name> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> <command-options> <detail /> </command-options> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
Command Options Description:
detail[Optional] Use the detail option to display management class, file space, backup, and archive information depending on the command with which it is used.
fromnode[Optional] The fromnode option permits one node to perform commands for another node. A user on another node must use the set access command to permit you to query, restore, or retrieve files or images for the other node.

documentation.description: This wrapper displays information about the management classes available in your active policy set.
